category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat, eliminates Dampness and kills parasites

indications: Dysentery, malaria, diabetes, indigestion, infantile malnutrition, snakebite, hookworm and other ascariasis

notes: The root is used as an antirheumatic, for the treatment of cough, rheumatic arthritis, traumatic injury, toothache, stomatitis, parotitis, mastitis, headache, dizziness and measles.
The leaf is used for infantile aphthae and traumatic injury.
